name: ATV Quad Bike Offroad Taxi Sim
name_original: ATV Quad Bike Offroad Taxi Sim
description:
Taxi driving is the most common part-time work being practiced in most of the countries, but in spite of regular taxi driving, there is a new concept of driving cabs. Modern ATV Quad Taxi Driving Simulator is the new concept of taxi driving on city roads. Get your hands on the quad taxi handle and start dropping passengers in this very new transporting game. Passengers can not only reach their destinations in time but also enjoy the ride in this modern ATV Cab. This open-air Cab Taxi will give passengers a very new experience of traveling from one spot to other. Apart from this, the easy-going ATV Cab mechanics, it can be transported on any kind of driving track. Even people can call for ATV Taxi from the mountain valleys.

Game Features:

- Crazy Stunts on sports ATV Quad Bike
- Thrilling gameplay in endless traffic mode
- Illustrated off-road tracks for training with four wheeler quad bike
- Adventurous & challenging pick & drop passengers missions
- Luxury garages for four wheeler Quad Bike ATV
- Fulfill racing mania with bumpy quad bike
- Original realistic quad bike physics in this ATV Cab game

Download ATV Quad Bike Offroad Crazy Taxi Driver Sim 3D to enjoy the intuitive controls, grand 3d city and offroad hilly environment to become a real ATV Quad Cab driver!
